CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Files.​Filters.​IgnoredSourceFolderPattern
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Files.​Filters.​IgnoredSourceFolderRegex
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Files.​Filters.​IgnoredSourceFolderPattern

An ignored source folder pattern.  If the pattern matches any folder name in the path, it will be ignored.  Patterns can use ? to represent any single character, and * to represent zero or more characters.  The pattern must match the full folder name, so "cli" will not match "client" although "cli*" will.

Functions
IgnoredSourceFolderPattern
public IgnoredSourceFolderPattern (
string newPattern
)

Creates a new object from the passed pattern
